resources.string: Please repeat the word PATAKA as many times as possible. Press \"record\" when you are ready.

Press the \"listen\" button to listen to the word, then press the \"record\" button and repeat the word you heard. After you finished repeating the word, press the \"recording ...\" button to stop the recording.
Press the \"record\" button, then repeat the word shown in the middle. After you finished repeating the word, press the \"recording ...\" button to stop the recording.
Please press the \"record\" button and then start describing the picture below. When you are finished press the \"recording ...\" button.
Please read the sentence on the screen. Press the \"record\" button when you are ready. When you are finished press the \"recording ...\" button.
In this exercise you have to repeat words, which you will hear from the device.\nThis exercise is used to measure the intelligebility of your speech.
In this exercise you have to choose a word, which you will hear from the device.\nThis exercise is used to measure your hearing ability.
In this exercise you have to read a list of different words.\nThis exercise is used to measure the articulation precision of your speech
In this exercise you have to describe a picture, which will be shown on the screen.\nThis exercise is used to measure the intonation of your voice during free speech.
In this exercise you have to read a sentence, which will be shown on the screen.\nThis exercise is used to measure the intonation of your voice during continuous speech.
In this exercise you have to repeat the word \"Pataka\" until a timer runs out.\nThis exercise is used to measure the rate at which you speak.

Welcome to CITA, the Cochlear-Implant-Testing-App. This Application is used to measure your speaking ability as well as your hearing ability. To do so you have to complete a set of exercises every day, which are used to evaluate the speaking rate and the intonation of your voice as well as your hearing ability. The app will provide you with an evaluation system, where you can check your results and see your improvements over time. Now press the start button below to start creating your profile for using this app. LetÂ´s go !
Trainingset\nThis is a set of exercises you should complete every day.\nStart now!

Welcome to the list of exercises!\nHere you can choose an exercise, which you want to do additionally to your daily training session.\nDo as much exercises as you want to test and improve your abilities!
Nothing left to do today. Good Job !
